name: Release 0.9.0
body:
- Minimum IDEA version 2022.2
- Upgrade to Camel 3.19
- Adapt the route debugger to Camel 3.19
- Set the body, headers or exchange properties from the context menu of the Debugger window using the Camel simple language
- Deprecated endpoint options are now marked with strike-through in endpoint URI
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.8.15
body: - Upgrade to Camel 3.19.0

name: Release 0.8.14
body: - Upgrade to Camel 3.18.2

name: Release 0.8.13
body:
- Upgraded to Camel 3.18.1
- Simplify types in code assistance for better readability
- Allow to suggest only the Kamelet options (configurable)
- Auto setup of the Camel Debugger for different Camel runtimes (Standalone/Main, SpringBoot, Quarkus)
- Allow to define custom plugin parameters in the Camel Runners
- Improve the multi-breakpoints support of the Camel Debugger
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.8.12
body: - Improved the look and feel of the code assistance of Kamelet names

name: Release 0.8.11
body:
- Code completion for Kamelets
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.8.10
body:
- Support for IDEA 2022.2 EAP
- Adding Camel to an existing project is now detected and enables the Camel plugin without having to reload the project
- Better detection of Camel runtimes (Spring Boot, Quarkus, Karaf, Camel Main, etc.)
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.8.9
body: - Bug fixes

name: Release 0.8.8
body:
- Upgraded to Camel 3.17.0
- Code completion for application.properties
- Code completion for endpoint headers in DSL
- Adapt to different Camel runtimes (Standalone, Spring Boot, Quarkus, Karaf)
- Code completion in yaml files for Spring Boot and Quarkus runtimes
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.8.7
body:
- Support for IDEA 2022.1
- Code completion for component headers (requires Camel 3.17)

name: Release 0.8.6
body:
- Support for IDEA 2022.1
- Code completion for component headers (requires Camel 3.17)

name: Release 0.8.5
body:
- Tech Preview of the new Camel Route Debugger (currently XML, YAML and Java routes)
- Bug fixes
- Removed notification about Camel Debugger is not found in classpath

name: Release 0.8.4
body:
- Tech Preview of the new Camel Route Debugger (currently XML, YAML and Java routes)
- Upgraded to Camel 3.16.0

name: Release 0.8.3
body:
- Tech Preview of the new Camel Route Debugger (currently XML, YAML and Java routes)
- Upgraded to Camel 3.15.0

name: Release 0.8.2
body: - Tech Preview of the new Camel Route Debugger (currently XML, YAML and Java routes)

name: Release 0.8.1
body: - Tech Preview of the new Camel Route Debugger (currently XML and Java routes)

name: Release 0.8.0
body: - Tech Preview of the new Camel Route Debugger (currently only XML routes)

name: Release 0.7.11
body:
- Upgrade to Camel 3.14.0
- Support for IDEA 2021.3

name: Release 0.7.10
body: - Upgraded to Camel 3.13.0

name: Release 0.7.9
body:
- Upgraded to Camel 3.11.1
- Updated to IDEA 2021.2

name: Release 0.7.8
body: Upgraded to Camel 3.11.0

name: Release 0.7.7
body:
- Upgraded to Camel 3.10.0
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.7.6
body:
- Support for IDEA 2021 only
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.7.5
body:
- Support for IDEA 2020 and 2021
- Better support for Camel 2.x
- Bug fixes

name: Release 0.7.4
body: - Bug fixes

name: Release 0.7.3
body:
- Fixed some IDEA Compatibility verification reporting warnings
- Improved inlined documentation (F1) for Camel endpoints
- External documentation (Shift F1) opens the link on Camel website (LTS version or latest)
- Removed obsolete scan 3rd-party Camel components using legacy format
- Deprecated endpoint options is now marked with strike-through in documentation popup
- Downloading camel-catalog is using an IDEA background task (with progress indicator)

name: Release 0.7.2
body:
- Fixed some IDEA Compatibility verification reporting warnings
- Support for Intellij 2020 did not work, so only 2021 is supported currently
- Restart no longer required after installing or updating this plugin

name: Release 0.7.1
body:
Removed Camel icon chooser as the official logo will be used
Fixed some IDEA Compatibility verification reporting warnings
Bug fixes

name: Release 0.7.0
body:
Upgraded to IDEA 2021
Upgraded to Camek v3

name: Release 0.6.4
body: - Upgrade to IDEA 2020.1

name: Release 0.6.3
body: - Upgrade to IDEA 2019.3.1

name: Release 0.6.2
body:
- Upgrade IDEA to 2019.2.2
- Upgrade Camel to 2.24.2

name: Release 0.6.1
body:
- Update version
- Update plugin.xml with change log
- Upgrade to Intellij 2019.2

name: Release 0.6.0
body:
- Bug fixes
- Upgrade to Intellij 2019.1.3
- Add support for using static string name as bean reference
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.24.1

name: Release 0.5.9
body:
- Fix an issue with the code completion also listed other elements beside the methods for beans.
- Fix an issue with the property ignore preference page was removed by mistake.

name: Release 0.5.8
body:
- Upgraded to to Apache Camel 2.24.0
- Upgraded to Intellij idea 2019.1.2
- Add support Spring bean code completion and find usage
- Add support for code completion with direct routes and find usage. Contributed by rastislavpapp
- Bug fixes
- Upgraded to Intellij idea 2019.1
- Upgraded to Intellij idea 2018.3.5
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.23.2

name: Release 0.5.4
body:
- Upgrade to IntelliJ 2018.1.4
- Bug fixes
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.22.0

name: Release 0.5.3
body:
- Upgrade to IntelliJ 2018.1.3
- Find usage where methods are called from Camel routes
- The preference UI has now a separate page for validation settings
- Bug fixes
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.21.1

name: Release 0.5.2
body:
- Added support for real time validation of JSonPath language
- Bug fixes
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.21.0

name: Release 0.5.1
body: - Bug fixes

name: Release 0.5.0
body:
- Added official Camel logo as new default gutter icon
- Add Camel Gutter for each HTTP methods when using REST DSL components
- Added initial support for quick navigation to bean methods from Java DSL
- Remove support for Groovy, Scala and Kotlin
- Various internal refactorings to cleanup the code
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.20.2
- Upgraded to IntelliJ 2017.3.4

name: Release 0.4.6
body:
- Fixed bug with apply button in plugin preferences
- Rewrite of plugin preferences page
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.20.1

name: Release 0.4.5
body:
- Fixed bug with loading 3rd party camel-catalog versions, such as 2.17.0.redhat-630187
- Upgraded to IntelliJ 2017.2.5
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.20.0

name: Release 0.4.4
body:
The 0.4.4 includes the following changes

- **Important:** We are dropping support for Groovy, Scala and Kotlin which are now deprecated in 0.4.x and intended to be removed from 0.5.0 release.
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.19.3

name: Release 0.4.3
body:
The 0.4.3 includes the following changes

- Upgraded to Intellij CI 2017.2
- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.19.2
- Fixed when closing project(s) could cause a NPE bug in this plugin

name: Release 0.4.2
body:
The 0.4.2 includes the following changes

- Upgraded to Apache Camel 2.19.1

name: Release 0.4.1
body:
The 0.4.1 includes the following changes

- Ballon notification only once which Camel version IDEA plugin is using while loading a big project (when download is disabled)

name: Release 0.4.0
body:
The 0.4.0 includes the following changes

- Updated to IDEA 2017.1
- Updated to Camel 2.19.0
- Camel icon is now also shown for route with uris defined as an object instance or field
- Minor bug fixes

name: Release 0.3.10
body:
The 0.3.10 includes the following changes

- Minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.9
body:
The 0.3.9 includes the following changes

- Support wildcards in exclude property file list.
- Minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.8
body:
The 0.3.8 includes the following changes
- Support for code completion and validation with multi-line endpoint URI
- Only show one Camel icon per route if the route endpoint uri was multi-lined.
- Minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.7
body:
The 0.3.7 includes the following changes
- Added support for Gradle based projects.
- Code completion improved to jump to position based on prefixed values.
- Navigate to linked Camel routes by clicking the Camel gutter icon.
- Minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.6
body:
The 0.3.6 includes the following changes
- Add preference page to exclude property and yml files
- Fixed plugin to work with Kotlin again
- Updated default Camel icon
- Minor bug fixes

name: Release 0.3.5
body:
The 0.3.5 includes the following changes
- Add icons for retina displays.
- Improved real time simple validation for Groovy.
- Add preference page to customize property ignore list
- Minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.4
body:
The 0.3.4 includes the following changes
- Real time validation of complex string values that use string concat, fields or other code structures is current skipped and not red-flagged.
- Endpoints that support extra options like HTTP based are now highlighted in code editor and shown in quick documentation.
- Inspection (analyze code) combined into a single inspection instead of individual per language.
- Minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.3
body:
The 0.3.3 includes the following changes
- Real time validation of Simple language now validates predicates vs expression mode.
- Add Simple language to inspection (analyze code).
- Added XML and Groovy language to real time validation of Simple language in editor.
- Added alternative Camel icon to choose from preference.
- Added support for downloading camel-catalog from 3rd party repositories defined in pom.xml such as JBoss Fuse.
- Other minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.2
body:
The 0.3.2 includes the following changes
- Real time validation of Simple language in editor for Java, Groovy, Kotlin, Scala, and XML.
- Real time validation for Camel endpoints can now check in consumer and producer only mode.
- Inspection (analyze code) to validate Camel endpoints in Java, Groovy, Kotlin, Scala, XML.
- Smart completion can show quick document for the selected option in the list (cltr + j)

name: Release 0.3.1
body:
The 0.3.1 includes the following changes
- Allow to turn on or off scanning for third party components.
- Real time validation is now checked for endpoints used outside routes.
- Minor bug fixes.

name: Release 0.3.0
body:
The 0.3.0 includes the following changes
- Real time validate Camel endpoints (underline errors in red).
- Added support for 3rd party Camel components (not from the Apache Camel release).
- Attempts to use same version as camel-core dependency from the loaded project (may require download over internet)
- Preference page to configure the plugin.
- Minor bug fixes

name: Release 0.2.2
body:
The 0.2.2 includes the following changes
- Show Camel icon in gutter where a Camel route starts.
- Support for endpoints using single quotes in Groovy

name: Release 0.2.1
body:
The 0.2.1 includes the following changes
- Plugin is only in use if the loaded project is a Camel project (has camel-core as library/dependency).
- Smart completion for Kotlin files.
- Endpoint options are now sorted.
- Endpoint options filtered to only include applicable options when used as consumer vs producer only mode.
- Show endpoint information in tooltip when hovering mouse over from/to etc in Java route builders

name: Release 0.2.0
body: Added support for xml, groovy and scala.

name: Release 0.1.7
body:
0.1.7 - Smart completion for YAML property files
0.1.6 - Project migrated to Maven and other minor bug fixes
0.1.5 - Intention to add Camel endpoint
0.1.4 - Smart completion for property placeholders
0.1.3 - Internal and external documentation for Camel endpoints
0.1.2 - Smart completion for property files
0.1.1 - Smart completion for Java DSL
0.1.0 - Early prototype

name: Early release 0.1.5
body:
A sneak peek of the release before Jetbrains approve the plugin so we can have users download the zip from github and install manually.

You can download camel-idea-plugin.zip and install it manually from IDEA in the Preference -> Plugins -> Install plugin from disk
